original_text: They shall bring up a crowd against you, and they shall stone you and cut you to pieces with their swords.
korean_text: 무리를 데리고 와서 너를 돌로 치며 칼로 찌르며

sentences.original_text: They shall bring up a crowd against you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너를 대적하여 무리를 일으킬 것이며

sentences.original_text: and cut you to pieces with their swords.
